abstract: Jamaican sprinter Usain Bolt is knocked over by cameraman on Segway scooter immediately after winning 200 meters at world track and field championships in Beijing; is uninjured and good-natured about fall; beat his main challenger American Justin Gatlin in both 100 and 200 meters to win 10th world championship gold medal.
lead_paragraph: Bolt retained his position as the world’s dominant sprinter and was unhurt in a postrace collision with a cameraman. Allyson Felix won the women’s 400.

headline.main: Only Man Who Can Topple Usain Bolt: A Photographer on a Segway
headline.print_headline: Only Man Who Can Topple Bolt: A Photographer on a Scooter

snippet: Bolt retained his position as the world’s dominant sprinter and was unhurt in a postrace collision with a cameraman. Allyson Felix won the women’s 400.
